option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; select.appendChild(option); }); } }); const monthSelectors = ['patientMonthFilter', 'dashboardMonthFilter', 'trackingMonthFilter']; monthSelectors.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; const options = []; const start = new Date(2024, 6); const end = new Date(2027, 7); for (let d = new Date(start); d <= end; d.setMonth(d.getMonth() + 1)) { const value = d.getFullYear() + '-' + String(d.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); const label = d.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long' }); options.push({ value, label }); } options.reverse().forEach(option => { const optionElement = document.createElement('option'); optionElement.value = option.value; optionElement.textContent = option.label; select.appendChild(optionElement); }); } }); } // Supply Management Functions function openAddSupplyModal() { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } editingSupply = null; document.getElementById('supplyModalTitle').textContent = 'Add New Supply'; document.getElementById('supplyCode').value = ''; document.getElementById('supplyDescription').value = ''; document.getElementById('supplyHcpcs').value = ''; document.getElementById('supplyCost').value = ''; document.getElementById('supplyModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('saveSupplyBtn').textContent = 'Save Supply'; document.getElementById('supplyModal').style.display = 'block'; } function editSupply(supplyId) { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } const supply = supplies.find(s => s.id === supplyId); if (!supply) return; editingSupply = supply; document.getElementById('supplyModalTitle').textContent = 'Edit Supply'; document.getElementById('supplyCode').value = supply.code || ''; document.getElementById('supplyDescription').value = supply.description || ''; document.getElementById('supplyHcpcs').value = supply.hcpcs || ''; document.getElementById('supplyCost').value = supply.cost || ''; document.getElementById('supplyModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('saveSupplyBtn').textContent = 'Update Supply'; document.getElementById('supplyModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeSupplyModal() { document.getElementById('supplyModal').style.display = 'none'; editingSupply = null; } async function saveSupply() { const code = document.getElementById('supplyCode').value.trim(); const description = document.getElementById('supplyDescription').value.trim(); const hcpcs = document.getElementById('supplyHcpcs').value.trim(); const cost = document.getElementById('supplyCost').value.trim(); const saveBtn = document.getElementById('saveSupplyBtn'); if (!code || !description) { showError('supplyModalError', 'Please fill in code and description'); return; } saveBtn.disabled = true; saveBtn.textContent = editingSupply ? 'Updating...' : 'Saving...'; try { const supplyData = { code: parseInt(code), description, hcpcs: hcpcs || null, cost: parseFloat(cost) || 0 }; if (editingSupply) { await apiCall('/supplies/' + editingSupply.id, { method: 'PUT', body: supplyData }); showToast('Supply updated successfully'); } else { await apiCall('/supplies', { method: 'POST', body: supplyData }); showToast('Supply added successfully'); } closeSupplyModal(); await loadSupplies(); await loadSuppliesTable(); await loadDashboard(); } catch (error) { showError('supplyModalError', error.message || 'Failed to save supply'); } finally { saveBtn.disabled = false; saveBtn.textContent = editingSupply ? 'Update Supply' : 'Save Supply'; } } function deleteSupply(supplyId) { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } const supply = supplies.find(s => s.id === supplyId); if (!supply) return; if (confirm('Delete supply "' + supply.description + '"? This action cannot be undone.')) { apiCall('/supplies/' + supplyId, { method: 'DELETE' }) .then(() => { showToast('Supply deleted successfully'); loadSupplies(); loadSuppliesTable(); loadDashboard(); }) .catch(error => { showToast(error.message || 'Failed to delete supply', 'error'); }); } } async function loadFacilities() { try { facilities = await apiCall('/facilities'); populatePatientFacilitySelects(); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load facilities:', error); facilities = []; } } function populatePatientFacilitySelects() { const selects = ['patientFacility']; selects.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; facilities.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; select.appendChild(option); }); } }); } function populateFilters() { const facilitySelectors = ['patientFacilityFilter', 'dashboardFacilityFilter']; facilitySelectors.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; facilities.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; select.appendChild(option); }); } }); const monthSelectors = ['patientMonthFilter', 'dashboardMonthFilter']; monthSelectors.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; const options = []; const start = new Date(2024, 6); const end = new Date(2027, 7); for (let d = new Date(start); d <= end; d.setMonth(d.getMonth() + 1)) { const value = d.getFullYear() + '-' + String(d.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); const label = d.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long' }); options.push({ value, label }); } options.reverse().forEach(option => { const optionElement = document.createElement('option'); optionElement.value = option.value; optionElement.textContent = option.label; select.appendChild(optionElement); }); } }); } async function loadDashboard() { try { const facilityFilter = document.getElementById('dashboardFacilityFilter')?.value || ''; const monthFilter = document.getElementById('dashboardMonthFilter')?.value || ''; let queryParams = ''; if (facilityFilter || monthFilter) { const params = new URLSearchParams(); if (facilityFilter) params.append('facilityId', facilityFilter); if (monthFilter) params.append('month', monthFilter); queryParams = '?' + params.toString(); } const [patientsData, facilitiesData, suppliesData, usersData] = await Promise.all([ apiCall('/patients' + queryParams), apiCall('/facilities'), apiCall('/supplies'), currentUser.role === 'admin' ? apiCall('/users') : Promise.resolve([]) ]); document.getElementById('totalPatients').textContent = formatNumber(patientsData.length); document.getElementById('totalFacilities').textContent = formatNumber(facilitiesData.length); document.getElementById('totalSupplies').textContent = formatNumber(suppliesData.length); document.getElementById('totalUsers').textContent = formatNumber(usersData.length); if (currentUser.role === 'admin') { try { const dashboardSummary = await apiCall('/dashboard/summary' + queryParams); const totalCost = dashboardSummary.reduce((sum, item) => sum + parseFloat(item.total_cost || 0), 0); document.getElementById('totalSupplyCost').textContent = formatCurrency(totalCost); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load dashboard summary:', error); } } patients = patientsData; } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load dashboard:', error); } } async function loadPatients() { try { const facilityFilter = document.getElementById('patientFacilityFilter')?.value || ''; const monthFilter = document.getElementById('patientMonthFilter')?.value || ''; let queryParams = ''; if (facilityFilter || monthFilter) { const params = new URLSearchParams(); if (facilityFilter) params.append('facilityId', facilityFilter); if (monthFilter) params.append('month', monthFilter); queryParams = '?' + params.toString(); } patients = await apiCall('/patients' + queryParams); displayPatients(); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load patients:', error); document.getElementById('patientsContent').innerHTML = '
Failed to load patients
'; } } function searchPatients() { const searchTerm = document.getElementById('patientSearch').value.toLowerCase(); displayPatients(searchTerm); } function displayPatients(searchTerm = '') { const content = document.getElementById('patientsContent'); let filteredPatients = patients; if (searchTerm) { filteredPatients = patients.filter(patient => patient.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ); } if (filteredPatients.length === 0) { content.innerHTML = '
No patients found
'; return; } const tableRows = []; filteredPatients.forEach(patient => { const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = '' + (patient.name || '') + '' + '' + (patient.mrn || 'N/A') + '' + '' + formatMonth(patient.month) + '' + '' + (patient.facility_name || 'N/A') + '' + '' + new Date(patient.created_at).toLocaleDateString() + '' + '
' + '' + '' + '
'; tableRows.push(row.outerHTML); }); const table = document.createElement('div'); table.className = 'table-container'; table.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + tableRows.join('') + '' + '
NameMRNMonthFacilityCreatedActions
'; content.innerHTML = ''; content.appendChild(table); } let editingPatient = null; function openAddPatientModal() { editingPatient = null; document.getElementById('patientModalTitle').textContent = 'Add New Patient'; document.getElementById('patientName').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientMrn').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientMonth').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientFacility').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('savePatientBtn').textContent = 'Save Patient'; document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display = 'block'; } function editPatient(patientId) { const patient = patients.find(p => p.id === patientId); if (!patient) return; editingPatient = patient; document.getElementById('patientModalTitle').textContent = 'Edit Patient'; document.getElementById('patientName').value = patient.name || ''; document.getElementById('patientMrn').value = patient.mrn || ''; document.getElementById('patientMonth').value = patient.month || ''; document.getElementById('patientFacility').value = patient.facility_id || ''; document.getElementById('patientModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('savePatientBtn').textContent = 'Update Patient'; document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closePatientModal() { document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display = 'none'; editingPatient = null; } async function savePatient() { const name = document.getElementById('patientName').value.trim(); const mrn = document.getElementById('patientMrn').value.trim(); const month = document.getElementById('patientMonth').value; const facilityId = document.getElementById('patientFacility').value; const saveBtn = document.getElementById('savePatientBtn'); if (!name || !month || !facilityId) { showError('patientModalError', 'Please fill in all required fields'); return; } saveBtn.disabled = true; saveBtn.textContent = editingPatient ? 'Updating...' : 'Saving...'; try { const patientData = { name, mrn: mrn || null, month, facilityId: parseInt(facilityId) }; if (editingPatient) { await apiCall('/patients/' + editingPatient.id, { method: 'PUT', body: patientData }); showToast('Patient updated successfully'); } else { await apiCall('/patients', { method: 'POST', body: patientData }); showToast('Patient added successfully'); } closePatientModal(); await loadPatients(); await loadDashboard(); } catch (error) { showError('patientModalError', error.message || 'Failed to save patient'); } finally { saveBtn.disabled = false; saveBtn.textContent = editingPatient ? 'Update Patient' : 'Save Patient'; } } function deletePatient(patientId) { const patient = patients.find(p => p.id === patientId); if (!patient) return; if (confirm('Delete patient "' + patient.name + '"? This action cannot be undone.')) { apiCall('/patients/' + patientId, { method: 'DELETE' }) .then(() => { showToast('Patient deleted successfully'); loadPatients(); loadDashboard(); }) .catch(error => { showToast(error.message || 'Failed to delete patient', 'error'); }); } } function showSection(sectionName) { document.querySelectorAll('.nav-btn').forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active')); if (event && event.target) { event.target.classList.add('active'); } document.querySelectorAll('.section').forEach(section => section.classList.remove('active')); document.getElementById(sectionName + 'Section').classList.add('active'); switch(sectionName) { case 'dashboard': loadDashboard(); break; case 'patients': loadPatients(); break; } } window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async () => { const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken'); if (token) { try { const response = await apiCall('/auth/verify'); currentUser = response.user; showMainApp(); } catch (error) { console.error('Token verification failed:', error); localStorage.removeItem('authToken'); } } }); document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => { if (e.key === 'Enter') { if (document.getElementById('loginForm').style.display !== 'none') { login(); } else if (document.getElementById('registerForm').style.display !== 'none') { register(); } else if (document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display === 'block') { savePatient(); } } if (e.key === 'Escape') { closePatientModal(); } }); window.onclick = function(event) { const patientModal = document.getElementById('patientModal'); if (event.target === patientModal) { closePatientModal(); } } + cost + '' + '' + isCustom + '' + '' + date + '' + '
' + '' + '' + '
'; tbody.appendChild(row); }); tableHTML.appendChild(thead); tableHTML.appendChild(tbody); table.appendChild(tableHTML); content.innerHTML = ''; content.appendChild(table); if (currentUser && currentUser.role === 'admin') { content.querySelectorAll('.admin-only').forEach(el => el.classList.add('show-admin')); } } // Batch Upload Functions function downloadPatientTemplate() { const csvContent = "Name,MRN,MM-YYYY,Facility\nJohn Doe,12345,2024-08,Main Hospital\nJane Smith,67890,2024-08,Clinic North"; const blob = new Blob([csvContent], { type: 'text/csv' }); const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob); const a = document.createElement('a'); a.href = url; a.download = 'patient_template.csv'; a.click(); window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url); } function openBatchUploadModal() { document.getElementById('batchUploadModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeBatchUploadModal() { document.getElementById('batchUploadModal').style.display = 'none'; batchUploadData = null; document.getElementById('batchUploadPreview').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('processBatchBtn').style.display = 'none'; } function handleBatchFile(file) { if (!file) return; const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = function(e) { try { const csv = e.target.result; const lines = csv.split('\n'); const headers = lines[0].split(','); if (!headers.includes('Name') || !headers.includes('MM-YYYY') || !headers.includes('Facility')) { showError('batchUploadError', 'Invalid file format. Please use the provided template.'); return; } batchUploadData = []; for (let i = 1; i < lines.length; i++) { if (lines[i].trim()) { const data = lines[i].split(','); batchUploadData.push({ name: data[0]?.trim(), mrn: data[1]?.trim(), month: data[2]?.trim(), facility: data[3]?.trim() }); } } document.getElementById('batchUploadPreview').innerHTML = '

Preview: ' + batchUploadData.length + ' patients ready to upload

'; document.getElementById('batchUploadPreview').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('processBatchBtn').style.display = 'inline-block'; } catch (error) { showError('batchUploadError', 'Error reading file: ' + error.message); } }; reader.readAsText(file); } async function processBatchUpload() { if (!batchUploadData || batchUploadData.length === 0) return; const btn = document.getElementById('processBatchBtn'); btn.disabled = true; btn.textContent = 'Processing...'; let successCount = 0; let errorCount = 0; for (const patientData of batchUploadData) { try { const facility = facilities.find(f => f.name === patientData.facility); if (!facility) { errorCount++; continue; } await apiCall('/patients', { method: 'POST', body: { name: patientData.name, mrn: patientData.mrn || null, month: patientData.month, facilityId: parseInt(facility.id) } }); successCount++; } catch (error) { errorCount++; } } showToast('Batch upload complete: ' + successCount + ' successful, ' + errorCount + ' failed'); closeBatchUploadModal(); await loadPatients(); await loadDashboard(); } // Facility Management function openAddFacilityModal() { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } editingFacility = null; document.getElementById('facilityModalTitle').textContent = 'Add New Facility'; document.getElementById('facilityName').value = ''; document.getElementById('facilityModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('saveFacilityBtn').textContent = 'Save Facility'; document.getElementById('facilityModal').style.display = 'block'; } function editFacility(facilityId) { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } const facility = facilities.find(f => f.id === facilityId); if (!facility) return; editingFacility = facility; document.getElementById('facilityModalTitle').textContent = 'Edit Facility'; document.getElementById('facilityName').value = facility.name || ''; document.getElementById('facilityModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('saveFacilityBtn').textContent = 'Update Facility'; document.getElementById('facilityModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeFacilityModal() { document.getElementById('facilityModal').style.display = 'none'; editingFacility = null; } async function saveFacility() { const name = document.getElementById('facilityName').value.trim(); const saveBtn = document.getElementById('saveFacilityBtn'); if (!name) { showError('facilityModalError', 'Please enter a facility name'); return; } saveBtn.disabled = true; saveBtn.textContent = editingFacility ? 'Updating...' : 'Saving...'; try { if (editingFacility) { await apiCall('/facilities/' + editingFacility.id, { method: 'PUT', body: { name } }); showToast('Facility updated successfully'); } else { await apiCall('/facilities', { method: 'POST', body: { name } }); showToast('Facility added successfully'); } closeFacilityModal(); await loadFacilities(); await loadFacilitiesTable(); populateFilters(); populateReportFilters(); } catch (error) { showError('facilityModalError', error.message || 'Failed to save facility'); } finally { saveBtn.disabled = false; saveBtn.textContent = editingFacility ? 'Update Facility' : 'Save Facility'; } } function deleteFacility(facilityId) { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } const facility = facilities.find(f => f.id === facilityId); if (!facility) return; if (confirm('Delete facility "' + facility.name + '"? This action cannot be undone.')) { apiCall('/facilities/' + facilityId, { method: 'DELETE' }) .then(() => { showToast('Facility deleted successfully'); loadFacilities(); loadFacilitiesTable(); populateFilters(); populateReportFilters(); }) .catch(error => { showToast(error.message || 'Failed to delete facility', 'error'); }); } } async function loadFacilitiesTable() { try { facilities = await apiCall('/facilities'); displayFacilities(); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load facilities:', error); document.getElementById('facilitiesContent').innerHTML = '
Failed to load facilities
'; } } function displayFacilities(searchTerm = '') { const content = document.getElementById('facilitiesContent'); let filteredFacilities = facilities; if (searchTerm) { filteredFacilities = facilities.filter(facility => facility.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ); } if (filteredFacilities.length === 0) { content.innerHTML = '
No facilities found
'; return; } const table = document.createElement('div'); table.className = 'table-container'; const tableHTML = document.createElement('table'); const thead = document.createElement('thead'); thead.innerHTML = '' + 'Name' + 'Created' + 'Actions' + ''; const tbody = document.createElement('tbody'); filteredFacilities.forEach(facility => { const row = document.createElement('tr'); const date = new Date(facility.created_at).toLocaleDateString(); row.innerHTML = '' + (facility.name || '') + '' + '' + date + '' + '
' + '' + '' + '
'; tbody.appendChild(row); }); tableHTML.appendChild(thead); tableHTML.appendChild(tbody); table.appendChild(tableHTML); content.innerHTML = ''; content.appendChild(table); if (currentUser && currentUser.role === 'admin') { content.querySelectorAll('.admin-only').forEach(el => el.classList.add('show-admin')); } } function formatNumber(num) { return parseInt(num).toLocaleString(); } function formatCurrency(num) { return '$' + parseInt(num).toLocaleString(); } function formatMonth(monthString) { if (!monthString) return 'N/A'; const date = new Date(monthString + '-01'); return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long' }); } function showError(elementId, message) { const errorElement = document.getElementById(elementId); if (errorElement) { errorElement.textContent = message; errorElement.style.display = 'block'; } } function showToast(message, type = 'success') { const toast = document.getElementById('toast'); if (toast) { toast.textContent = message; toast.className = 'toast' + (type === 'error' ? ' error' : ''); toast.classList.add('show'); setTimeout(() => { toast.classList.remove('show'); }, 4000); } } async function login() { const email = document.getElementById('loginEmail').value.trim(); const password = document.getElementById('loginPassword').value.trim(); const loginBtn = document.getElementById('loginBtn'); if (!email || !password) { showError('loginError', 'Please enter both email and password'); return; } loginBtn.disabled = true; loginBtn.textContent = 'Signing In...'; try { const response = await apiCall('/auth/login', { method: 'POST', body: { email, password } }); localStorage.setItem('authToken', response.token); currentUser = response.user; showMainApp(); } catch (error) { showError('loginError', error.message || 'Login failed'); } finally { loginBtn.disabled = false; loginBtn.textContent = 'Sign In'; } } async function register() { const name = document.getElementById('registerName').value.trim(); const email = document.getElementById('registerEmail').value.trim(); const password = document.getElementById('registerPassword').value.trim(); const facilityId = document.getElementById('registerFacility').value; const registerBtn = document.getElementById('registerBtn'); if (!name || !email || !password || !facilityId) { showError('registerError', 'Please fill in all fields'); return; } registerBtn.disabled = true; registerBtn.textContent = 'Registering...'; try { await apiCall('/auth/register', { method: 'POST', body: { name, email, password, facilityId: parseInt(facilityId) } }); showToast('Registration successful! Please wait for admin approval.'); toggleAuthMode(); } catch (error) { showError('registerError', error.message || 'Registration failed'); } finally { registerBtn.disabled = false; registerBtn.textContent = 'Register'; } } function logout() { localStorage.removeItem('authToken'); currentUser = null; document.getElementById('authContainer').style.display = 'flex'; document.getElementById('mainApp').style.display = 'none'; } function toggleAuthMode() { const loginForm = document.getElementById('loginForm'); const registerForm = document.getElementById('registerForm'); if (loginForm.style.display === 'none') { loginForm.style.display = 'block'; registerForm.style.display = 'none'; } else { loginForm.style.display = 'none'; registerForm.style.display = 'block'; loadFacilitiesForRegistration(); } } async function loadFacilitiesForRegistration() { try { const facilityList = await apiCall('/facilities/public'); const select = document.getElementById('registerFacility'); select.innerHTML = ''; facilityList.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; select.appendChild(option); }); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load facilities:', error); } } function showMainApp() { document.getElementById('authContainer').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('mainApp').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('userWelcome').textContent = 'Welcome, ' + currentUser.name; if (currentUser.role === 'admin') { document.querySelectorAll('.admin-only').forEach(el => el.classList.add('show-admin')); } initializeApp(); } async function initializeApp() { try { await loadFacilities(); await loadSupplies(); await loadUsers(); await loadDashboard(); populateFilters(); populateReportFilters(); await loadTrackingPatients(); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to initialize app:', error); } } async function loadSupplies() { try { supplies = await apiCall('/supplies'); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load supplies:', error); supplies = []; } } async function loadUsers() { if (currentUser?.role === 'admin') { try { users = await apiCall('/users'); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load users:', error); users = []; } } } function populateReportFilters() { const facilitySelect = document.getElementById('reportFacilityFilter'); if (facilitySelect) { facilitySelect.innerHTML = ''; facilities.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; facilitySelect.appendChild(option); }); } const monthSelect = document.getElementById('reportMonthFilter'); if (monthSelect) { monthSelect.innerHTML = ''; const options = []; const start = new Date(2024, 6); const end = new Date(2027, 7); for (let d = new Date(start); d <= end; d.setMonth(d.getMonth() + 1)) { const value = d.getFullYear() + '-' + String(d.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); const label = d.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long' }); options.push({ value, label }); } options.reverse().forEach(option => { const optionElement = document.createElement('option'); optionElement.value = option.value; optionElement.textContent = option.label; monthSelect.appendChild(optionElement); }); } } function populateFilters() { const facilitySelectors = ['patientFacilityFilter', 'dashboardFacilityFilter', 'trackingFacilityFilter']; facilitySelectors.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; facilities.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; select.appendChild(option); }); } }); const monthSelectors = ['patientMonthFilter', 'dashboardMonthFilter', 'trackingMonthFilter']; monthSelectors.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; const options = []; const start = new Date(2024, 6); const end = new Date(2027, 7); for (let d = new Date(start); d <= end; d.setMonth(d.getMonth() + 1)) { const value = d.getFullYear() + '-' + String(d.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); const label = d.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long' }); options.push({ value, label }); } options.reverse().forEach(option => { const optionElement = document.createElement('option'); optionElement.value = option.value; optionElement.textContent = option.label; select.appendChild(optionElement); }); } }); } // Supply Management Functions function openAddSupplyModal() { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } editingSupply = null; document.getElementById('supplyModalTitle').textContent = 'Add New Supply'; document.getElementById('supplyCode').value = ''; document.getElementById('supplyDescription').value = ''; document.getElementById('supplyHcpcs').value = ''; document.getElementById('supplyCost').value = ''; document.getElementById('supplyModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('saveSupplyBtn').textContent = 'Save Supply'; document.getElementById('supplyModal').style.display = 'block'; } function editSupply(supplyId) { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } const supply = supplies.find(s => s.id === supplyId); if (!supply) return; editingSupply = supply; document.getElementById('supplyModalTitle').textContent = 'Edit Supply'; document.getElementById('supplyCode').value = supply.code || ''; document.getElementById('supplyDescription').value = supply.description || ''; document.getElementById('supplyHcpcs').value = supply.hcpcs || ''; document.getElementById('supplyCost').value = supply.cost || ''; document.getElementById('supplyModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('saveSupplyBtn').textContent = 'Update Supply'; document.getElementById('supplyModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeSupplyModal() { document.getElementById('supplyModal').style.display = 'none'; editingSupply = null; } async function saveSupply() { const code = document.getElementById('supplyCode').value.trim(); const description = document.getElementById('supplyDescription').value.trim(); const hcpcs = document.getElementById('supplyHcpcs').value.trim(); const cost = document.getElementById('supplyCost').value.trim(); const saveBtn = document.getElementById('saveSupplyBtn'); if (!code || !description) { showError('supplyModalError', 'Please fill in code and description'); return; } saveBtn.disabled = true; saveBtn.textContent = editingSupply ? 'Updating...' : 'Saving...'; try { const supplyData = { code: parseInt(code), description, hcpcs: hcpcs || null, cost: parseFloat(cost) || 0 }; if (editingSupply) { await apiCall('/supplies/' + editingSupply.id, { method: 'PUT', body: supplyData }); showToast('Supply updated successfully'); } else { await apiCall('/supplies', { method: 'POST', body: supplyData }); showToast('Supply added successfully'); } closeSupplyModal(); await loadSupplies(); await loadSuppliesTable(); await loadDashboard(); } catch (error) { showError('supplyModalError', error.message || 'Failed to save supply'); } finally { saveBtn.disabled = false; saveBtn.textContent = editingSupply ? 'Update Supply' : 'Save Supply'; } } function deleteSupply(supplyId) { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } const supply = supplies.find(s => s.id === supplyId); if (!supply) return; if (confirm('Delete supply "' + supply.description + '"? This action cannot be undone.')) { apiCall('/supplies/' + supplyId, { method: 'DELETE' }) .then(() => { showToast('Supply deleted successfully'); loadSupplies(); loadSuppliesTable(); loadDashboard(); }) .catch(error => { showToast(error.message || 'Failed to delete supply', 'error'); }); } } async function loadFacilities() { try { facilities = await apiCall('/facilities'); populatePatientFacilitySelects(); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load facilities:', error); facilities = []; } } function populatePatientFacilitySelects() { const selects = ['patientFacility']; selects.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; facilities.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; select.appendChild(option); }); } }); } function populateFilters() { const facilitySelectors = ['patientFacilityFilter', 'dashboardFacilityFilter']; facilitySelectors.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; facilities.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; select.appendChild(option); }); } }); const monthSelectors = ['patientMonthFilter', 'dashboardMonthFilter']; monthSelectors.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; const options = []; const start = new Date(2024, 6); const end = new Date(2027, 7); for (let d = new Date(start); d <= end; d.setMonth(d.getMonth() + 1)) { const value = d.getFullYear() + '-' + String(d.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); const label = d.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long' }); options.push({ value, label }); } options.reverse().forEach(option => { const optionElement = document.createElement('option'); optionElement.value = option.value; optionElement.textContent = option.label; select.appendChild(optionElement); }); } }); } async function loadDashboard() { try { const facilityFilter = document.getElementById('dashboardFacilityFilter')?.value || ''; const monthFilter = document.getElementById('dashboardMonthFilter')?.value || ''; let queryParams = ''; if (facilityFilter || monthFilter) { const params = new URLSearchParams(); if (facilityFilter) params.append('facilityId', facilityFilter); if (monthFilter) params.append('month', monthFilter); queryParams = '?' + params.toString(); } const [patientsData, facilitiesData, suppliesData, usersData] = await Promise.all([ apiCall('/patients' + queryParams), apiCall('/facilities'), apiCall('/supplies'), currentUser.role === 'admin' ? apiCall('/users') : Promise.resolve([]) ]); document.getElementById('totalPatients').textContent = formatNumber(patientsData.length); document.getElementById('totalFacilities').textContent = formatNumber(facilitiesData.length); document.getElementById('totalSupplies').textContent = formatNumber(suppliesData.length); document.getElementById('totalUsers').textContent = formatNumber(usersData.length); if (currentUser.role === 'admin') { try { const dashboardSummary = await apiCall('/dashboard/summary' + queryParams); const totalCost = dashboardSummary.reduce((sum, item) => sum + parseFloat(item.total_cost || 0), 0); document.getElementById('totalSupplyCost').textContent = formatCurrency(totalCost); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load dashboard summary:', error); } } patients = patientsData; } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load dashboard:', error); } } async function loadPatients() { try { const facilityFilter = document.getElementById('patientFacilityFilter')?.value || ''; const monthFilter = document.getElementById('patientMonthFilter')?.value || ''; let queryParams = ''; if (facilityFilter || monthFilter) { const params = new URLSearchParams(); if (facilityFilter) params.append('facilityId', facilityFilter); if (monthFilter) params.append('month', monthFilter); queryParams = '?' + params.toString(); } patients = await apiCall('/patients' + queryParams); displayPatients(); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load patients:', error); document.getElementById('patientsContent').innerHTML = '
Failed to load patients
'; } } function searchPatients() { const searchTerm = document.getElementById('patientSearch').value.toLowerCase(); displayPatients(searchTerm); } function displayPatients(searchTerm = '') { const content = document.getElementById('patientsContent'); let filteredPatients = patients; if (searchTerm) { filteredPatients = patients.filter(patient => patient.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ); } if (filteredPatients.length === 0) { content.innerHTML = '
No patients found
'; return; } const tableRows = []; filteredPatients.forEach(patient => { const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = '' + (patient.name || '') + '' + '' + (patient.mrn || 'N/A') + '' + '' + formatMonth(patient.month) + '' + '' + (patient.facility_name || 'N/A') + '' + '' + new Date(patient.created_at).toLocaleDateString() + '' + '
' + '' + '' + '
'; tableRows.push(row.outerHTML); }); const table = document.createElement('div'); table.className = 'table-container'; table.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + tableRows.join('') + '' + '
NameMRNMonthFacilityCreatedActions
'; content.innerHTML = ''; content.appendChild(table); } let editingPatient = null; function openAddPatientModal() { editingPatient = null; document.getElementById('patientModalTitle').textContent = 'Add New Patient'; document.getElementById('patientName').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientMrn').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientMonth').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientFacility').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('savePatientBtn').textContent = 'Save Patient'; document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display = 'block'; } function editPatient(patientId) { const patient = patients.find(p => p.id === patientId); if (!patient) return; editingPatient = patient; document.getElementById('patientModalTitle').textContent = 'Edit Patient'; document.getElementById('patientName').value = patient.name || ''; document.getElementById('patientMrn').value = patient.mrn || ''; document.getElementById('patientMonth').value = patient.month || ''; document.getElementById('patientFacility').value = patient.facility_id || ''; document.getElementById('patientModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('savePatientBtn').textContent = 'Update Patient'; document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closePatientModal() { document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display = 'none'; editingPatient = null; } async function savePatient() { const name = document.getElementById('patientName').value.trim(); const mrn = document.getElementById('patientMrn').value.trim(); const month = document.getElementById('patientMonth').value; const facilityId = document.getElementById('patientFacility').value; const saveBtn = document.getElementById('savePatientBtn'); if (!name || !month || !facilityId) { showError('patientModalError', 'Please fill in all required fields'); return; } saveBtn.disabled = true; saveBtn.textContent = editingPatient ? 'Updating...' : 'Saving...'; try { const patientData = { name, mrn: mrn || null, month, facilityId: parseInt(facilityId) }; if (editingPatient) { await apiCall('/patients/' + editingPatient.id, { method: 'PUT', body: patientData }); showToast('Patient updated successfully'); } else { await apiCall('/patients', { method: 'POST', body: patientData }); showToast('Patient added successfully'); } closePatientModal(); await loadPatients(); await loadDashboard(); } catch (error) { showError('patientModalError', error.message || 'Failed to save patient'); } finally { saveBtn.disabled = false; saveBtn.textContent = editingPatient ? 'Update Patient' : 'Save Patient'; } } function deletePatient(patientId) { const patient = patients.find(p => p.id === patientId); if (!patient) return; if (confirm('Delete patient "' + patient.name + '"? This action cannot be undone.')) { apiCall('/patients/' + patientId, { method: 'DELETE' }) .then(() => { showToast('Patient deleted successfully'); loadPatients(); loadDashboard(); }) .catch(error => { showToast(error.message || 'Failed to delete patient', 'error'); }); } } function showSection(sectionName) { document.querySelectorAll('.nav-btn').forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active')); if (event && event.target) { event.target.classList.add('active'); } document.querySelectorAll('.section').forEach(section => section.classList.remove('active')); document.getElementById(sectionName + 'Section').classList.add('active'); switch(sectionName) { case 'dashboard': loadDashboard(); break; case 'patients': loadPatients(); break; } } window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async () => { const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken'); if (token) { try { const response = await apiCall('/auth/verify'); currentUser = response.user; showMainApp(); } catch (error) { console.error('Token verification failed:', error); localStorage.removeItem('authToken'); } } }); document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => { if (e.key === 'Enter') { if (document.getElementById('loginForm').style.display !== 'none') { login(); } else if (document.getElementById('registerForm').style.display !== 'none') { register(); } else if (document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display === 'block') { savePatient(); } } if (e.key === 'Escape') { closePatientModal(); } }); window.onclick = function(event) { const patientModal = document.getElementById('patientModal'); if (event.target === patientModal) { closePatientModal(); } } + p.totalCost.toFixed(2) + '' + p.supplies.size + '').join('') + '
'); } function generateSupplyUsageReport(data, facilityId, month) { const facilityName = facilityId ? (facilities.find(f => f.id == facilityId)?.name || 'Unknown') : 'All Facilities'; const monthName = month ? formatMonth(month) : 'All Months'; const supplyUsage = {}; data.forEach(item => { const key = item.ar_code || 'Unknown'; if (!supplyUsage[key]) { supplyUsage[key] = { code: key, description: item.item_description, hcpcs: item.hcpcs, totalUnits: 0, totalCost: 0, patientCount: new Set() }; } supplyUsage[key].totalUnits += parseInt(item.total_units || 0); supplyUsage[key].totalCost += parseFloat(item.total_cost || 0); supplyUsage[key].patientCount.add(item.patient_name); }); const sortedSupplies = Object.values(supplyUsage).sort((a, b) => b.totalUnits - a.totalUnits); const totalUsage = sortedSupplies.reduce((sum, s) => sum + s.totalUnits, 0); return '
' + '' + '
' + '
' + '

Supply Usage Report

' + '

Facility: ' + facilityName + ' | Period: ' + monthName + '

' + '

Unique Supplies: ' + sortedSupplies.length + ' | Total Usage: ' + totalUsage + ' units

' + '
' + (sortedSupplies.length === 0 ? '
No supply usage data found
' : '
' + sortedSupplies.map(s => '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + ''; const tbody = document.createElement('tbody'); filteredUsers.forEach(user => { const row = document.createElement('tr'); const statusColor = user.is_approved ? '#38a169' : '#e53e3e'; const statusText = user.is_approved ? 'Approved' : 'Pending'; row.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + ''; tbody.appendChild(row); }); tableHTML.appendChild(thead); tableHTML.appendChild(tbody); table.appendChild(tableHTML); content.innerHTML = ''; content.appendChild(table); } // Supply Tracking Functions async function loadTrackingPatients() { try { const facilityFilter = document.getElementById('trackingFacilityFilter')?.value || ''; const monthFilter = document.getElementById('trackingMonthFilter')?.value || ''; let filteredPatients = [...patients]; if (facilityFilter) { filteredPatients = filteredPatients.filter(p => p.facility_id == facilityFilter); } if (monthFilter) { filteredPatients = filteredPatients.filter(p => p.month === monthFilter); } const trackingSelect = document.getElementById('trackingPatientSelect'); if (trackingSelect) { trackingSelect.innerHTML = ''; filteredPatients.forEach(patient => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = patient.id; option.textContent = patient.name + ' - ' + formatMonth(patient.month) + ' (' + (patient.facility_name || 'Unknown') + ')'; trackingSelect.appendChild(option); }); } } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load tracking patients:', error); } } async function loadTrackingGrid() { const patientId = document.getElementById('trackingPatientSelect').value; const content = document.getElementById('trackingContent'); if (!patientId) { content.innerHTML = '
Select a patient to begin supply tracking
'; return; } content.innerHTML = '
Loading tracking grid...
'; try { const patient = patients.find(p => p.id == patientId); selectedTrackingPatient = patient; trackingData = await apiCall('/tracking/' + patientId); createTrackingGrid(patient); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load tracking grid:', error); content.innerHTML = '
Failed to load tracking data
'; } } function createTrackingGrid(patient) { const content = document.getElementById('trackingContent'); const year = parseInt(patient.month.split('-')[0]); const month = parseInt(patient.month.split('-')[1]); const daysInMonth = new Date(year, month, 0).getDate(); const patientInfo = document.createElement('div'); patientInfo.className = 'tracking-patient-info'; patientInfo.innerHTML = '

' + (patient.name || '') + '

' + '

MRN: ' + (patient.mrn || 'N/A') + ' | Month: ' + formatMonth(patient.month) + ' | Facility: ' + (patient.facility_name || 'N/A') + '

'; if (currentUser.role === 'admin') { content.innerHTML = ''; content.appendChild(patientInfo); content.appendChild(createAdminTrackingGrid(patient, daysInMonth)); } else { content.innerHTML = ''; content.appendChild(patientInfo); content.appendChild(createUserTrackingGrid(patient, daysInMonth)); } } function createAdminTrackingGrid(patient, daysInMonth) { const gridContainer = document.createElement('div'); gridContainer.className = 'tracking-grid'; const table = document.createElement('table'); table.className = 'tracking-table'; table.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + ''; const tbody = document.createElement('tbody'); supplies.forEach(supply => { const supplyTracking = trackingData.filter(t => t.supply_id == supply.id); const totalUnits = supplyTracking.reduce((sum, t) => sum + (t.quantity || 0), 0); const totalCost = totalUnits * (supply.cost || 0); const woundDx = supplyTracking.find(t => t.wound_dx)?.wound_dx || ''; if (totalUnits > 0) { const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + ''; const tbody = document.createElement('tbody'); filteredSupplies.forEach(supply => { const row = document.createElement('tr'); const isCustom = supply.is_custom ? 'Custom' : 'Standard'; const cost = parseFloat(supply.cost || 0).toFixed(2); const date = new Date(supply.created_at).toLocaleDateString(); row.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + ''; tableRows.push(row.outerHTML); }); const table = document.createElement('div'); table.className = 'table-container'; table.innerHTML = '
Supply CodeDescriptionHCPCSTotal UnitsPatient CountTotal CostAvg Cost per Unit
' + s.code + '' + (s.description || '') + '' + (s.hcpcs || 'N/A') + '' + s.totalUnits + '' + s.patientCount.size + ' function deleteUser(userId) { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } const user = users.find(u => u.id === userId); if (!user) return; if (confirm('Delete user "' + user.name + '"? This action cannot be undone.')) { apiCall('/users/' + userId, { method: 'DELETE' }) .then(() => { showToast('User deleted successfully'); loadUsers(); loadUsersTable(); }) .catch(error => { showToast(error.message || 'Failed to delete user', 'error'); }); } } async function loadUsersTable() { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') return; try { users = await apiCall('/users'); displayUsers(); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load users:', error); document.getElementById('usersContent').innerHTML = '
Failed to load users
'; } } function displayUsers(searchTerm = '') { const content = document.getElementById('usersContent'); let filteredUsers = users; if (searchTerm) { filteredUsers = users.filter(user => user.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) || user.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ); } if (filteredUsers.length === 0) { content.innerHTML = '
No users found
'; return; } const table = document.createElement('div'); table.className = 'table-container'; const tableHTML = document.createElement('table'); const thead = document.createElement('thead'); thead.innerHTML = '
NameEmailRoleFacilityStatusActions
' + (user.name || '') + '' + (user.email || '') + '' + (user.role || '') + '' + (user.facility_name || 'N/A') + '' + statusText + '
' + '' + '' + '
NameMRNMM-YYYYFacilityAR CodeDescriptionHCPCSTotal UnitsTotal CostWound Dx
' + (patient.name || '') + '' + (patient.mrn || 'N/A') + '' + formatMonth(patient.month) + '' + (patient.facility_name || '') + '' + (supply.code || '') + '' + (supply.description || '') + '' + (supply.hcpcs || 'N/A') + '' + totalUnits + ' function displaySupplies(searchTerm = '') { const content = document.getElementById('suppliesContent'); let filteredSupplies = supplies; if (searchTerm) { filteredSupplies = supplies.filter(supply => supply.code.toString().includes(searchTerm) || supply.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ); } if (filteredSupplies.length === 0) { content.innerHTML = '
No supplies found
'; return; } const table = document.createElement('div'); table.className = 'table-container'; const tableHTML = document.createElement('table'); // Create header const thead = document.createElement('thead'); thead.innerHTML = '
AR CodeDescriptionHCPCSUnit CostTypeCreatedActions
' + (supply.code || '') + '' + (supply.description || '') + '' + (supply.hcpcs || 'N/A') + ' function formatNumber(num) { return parseInt(num).toLocaleString(); } function formatCurrency(num) { return '$' + parseInt(num).toLocaleString(); } function formatMonth(monthString) { if (!monthString) return 'N/A'; const date = new Date(monthString + '-01'); return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long' }); } function showError(elementId, message) { const errorElement = document.getElementById(elementId); if (errorElement) { errorElement.textContent = message; errorElement.style.display = 'block'; } } function showToast(message, type = 'success') { const toast = document.getElementById('toast'); if (toast) { toast.textContent = message; toast.className = 'toast' + (type === 'error' ? ' error' : ''); toast.classList.add('show'); setTimeout(() => { toast.classList.remove('show'); }, 4000); } } async function login() { const email = document.getElementById('loginEmail').value.trim(); const password = document.getElementById('loginPassword').value.trim(); const loginBtn = document.getElementById('loginBtn'); if (!email || !password) { showError('loginError', 'Please enter both email and password'); return; } loginBtn.disabled = true; loginBtn.textContent = 'Signing In...'; try { const response = await apiCall('/auth/login', { method: 'POST', body: { email, password } }); localStorage.setItem('authToken', response.token); currentUser = response.user; showMainApp(); } catch (error) { showError('loginError', error.message || 'Login failed'); } finally { loginBtn.disabled = false; loginBtn.textContent = 'Sign In'; } } async function register() { const name = document.getElementById('registerName').value.trim(); const email = document.getElementById('registerEmail').value.trim(); const password = document.getElementById('registerPassword').value.trim(); const facilityId = document.getElementById('registerFacility').value; const registerBtn = document.getElementById('registerBtn'); if (!name || !email || !password || !facilityId) { showError('registerError', 'Please fill in all fields'); return; } registerBtn.disabled = true; registerBtn.textContent = 'Registering...'; try { await apiCall('/auth/register', { method: 'POST', body: { name, email, password, facilityId: parseInt(facilityId) } }); showToast('Registration successful! Please wait for admin approval.'); toggleAuthMode(); } catch (error) { showError('registerError', error.message || 'Registration failed'); } finally { registerBtn.disabled = false; registerBtn.textContent = 'Register'; } } function logout() { localStorage.removeItem('authToken'); currentUser = null; document.getElementById('authContainer').style.display = 'flex'; document.getElementById('mainApp').style.display = 'none'; } function toggleAuthMode() { const loginForm = document.getElementById('loginForm'); const registerForm = document.getElementById('registerForm'); if (loginForm.style.display === 'none') { loginForm.style.display = 'block'; registerForm.style.display = 'none'; } else { loginForm.style.display = 'none'; registerForm.style.display = 'block'; loadFacilitiesForRegistration(); } } async function loadFacilitiesForRegistration() { try { const facilityList = await apiCall('/facilities/public'); const select = document.getElementById('registerFacility'); select.innerHTML = ''; facilityList.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; select.appendChild(option); }); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load facilities:', error); } } function showMainApp() { document.getElementById('authContainer').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('mainApp').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('userWelcome').textContent = 'Welcome, ' + currentUser.name; if (currentUser.role === 'admin') { document.querySelectorAll('.admin-only').forEach(el => el.classList.add('show-admin')); } initializeApp(); } async function initializeApp() { try { await loadFacilities(); await loadSupplies(); await loadUsers(); await loadDashboard(); populateFilters(); populateReportFilters(); await loadTrackingPatients(); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to initialize app:', error); } } async function loadSupplies() { try { supplies = await apiCall('/supplies'); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load supplies:', error); supplies = []; } } async function loadUsers() { if (currentUser?.role === 'admin') { try { users = await apiCall('/users'); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load users:', error); users = []; } } } function populateReportFilters() { const facilitySelect = document.getElementById('reportFacilityFilter'); if (facilitySelect) { facilitySelect.innerHTML = ''; facilities.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; facilitySelect.appendChild(option); }); } const monthSelect = document.getElementById('reportMonthFilter'); if (monthSelect) { monthSelect.innerHTML = ''; const options = []; const start = new Date(2024, 6); const end = new Date(2027, 7); for (let d = new Date(start); d <= end; d.setMonth(d.getMonth() + 1)) { const value = d.getFullYear() + '-' + String(d.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); const label = d.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long' }); options.push({ value, label }); } options.reverse().forEach(option => { const optionElement = document.createElement('option'); optionElement.value = option.value; optionElement.textContent = option.label; monthSelect.appendChild(optionElement); }); } } function populateFilters() { const facilitySelectors = ['patientFacilityFilter', 'dashboardFacilityFilter', 'trackingFacilityFilter']; facilitySelectors.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; facilities.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; select.appendChild(option); }); } }); const monthSelectors = ['patientMonthFilter', 'dashboardMonthFilter', 'trackingMonthFilter']; monthSelectors.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; const options = []; const start = new Date(2024, 6); const end = new Date(2027, 7); for (let d = new Date(start); d <= end; d.setMonth(d.getMonth() + 1)) { const value = d.getFullYear() + '-' + String(d.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); const label = d.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long' }); options.push({ value, label }); } options.reverse().forEach(option => { const optionElement = document.createElement('option'); optionElement.value = option.value; optionElement.textContent = option.label; select.appendChild(optionElement); }); } }); } // Supply Management Functions function openAddSupplyModal() { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } editingSupply = null; document.getElementById('supplyModalTitle').textContent = 'Add New Supply'; document.getElementById('supplyCode').value = ''; document.getElementById('supplyDescription').value = ''; document.getElementById('supplyHcpcs').value = ''; document.getElementById('supplyCost').value = ''; document.getElementById('supplyModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('saveSupplyBtn').textContent = 'Save Supply'; document.getElementById('supplyModal').style.display = 'block'; } function editSupply(supplyId) { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } const supply = supplies.find(s => s.id === supplyId); if (!supply) return; editingSupply = supply; document.getElementById('supplyModalTitle').textContent = 'Edit Supply'; document.getElementById('supplyCode').value = supply.code || ''; document.getElementById('supplyDescription').value = supply.description || ''; document.getElementById('supplyHcpcs').value = supply.hcpcs || ''; document.getElementById('supplyCost').value = supply.cost || ''; document.getElementById('supplyModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('saveSupplyBtn').textContent = 'Update Supply'; document.getElementById('supplyModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeSupplyModal() { document.getElementById('supplyModal').style.display = 'none'; editingSupply = null; } async function saveSupply() { const code = document.getElementById('supplyCode').value.trim(); const description = document.getElementById('supplyDescription').value.trim(); const hcpcs = document.getElementById('supplyHcpcs').value.trim(); const cost = document.getElementById('supplyCost').value.trim(); const saveBtn = document.getElementById('saveSupplyBtn'); if (!code || !description) { showError('supplyModalError', 'Please fill in code and description'); return; } saveBtn.disabled = true; saveBtn.textContent = editingSupply ? 'Updating...' : 'Saving...'; try { const supplyData = { code: parseInt(code), description, hcpcs: hcpcs || null, cost: parseFloat(cost) || 0 }; if (editingSupply) { await apiCall('/supplies/' + editingSupply.id, { method: 'PUT', body: supplyData }); showToast('Supply updated successfully'); } else { await apiCall('/supplies', { method: 'POST', body: supplyData }); showToast('Supply added successfully'); } closeSupplyModal(); await loadSupplies(); await loadSuppliesTable(); await loadDashboard(); } catch (error) { showError('supplyModalError', error.message || 'Failed to save supply'); } finally { saveBtn.disabled = false; saveBtn.textContent = editingSupply ? 'Update Supply' : 'Save Supply'; } } function deleteSupply(supplyId) { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } const supply = supplies.find(s => s.id === supplyId); if (!supply) return; if (confirm('Delete supply "' + supply.description + '"? This action cannot be undone.')) { apiCall('/supplies/' + supplyId, { method: 'DELETE' }) .then(() => { showToast('Supply deleted successfully'); loadSupplies(); loadSuppliesTable(); loadDashboard(); }) .catch(error => { showToast(error.message || 'Failed to delete supply', 'error'); }); } } async function loadFacilities() { try { facilities = await apiCall('/facilities'); populatePatientFacilitySelects(); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load facilities:', error); facilities = []; } } function populatePatientFacilitySelects() { const selects = ['patientFacility']; selects.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; facilities.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; select.appendChild(option); }); } }); } function populateFilters() { const facilitySelectors = ['patientFacilityFilter', 'dashboardFacilityFilter']; facilitySelectors.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; facilities.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; select.appendChild(option); }); } }); const monthSelectors = ['patientMonthFilter', 'dashboardMonthFilter']; monthSelectors.forEach(selectId => { const select = document.getElementById(selectId); if (select) { select.innerHTML = ''; const options = []; const start = new Date(2024, 6); const end = new Date(2027, 7); for (let d = new Date(start); d <= end; d.setMonth(d.getMonth() + 1)) { const value = d.getFullYear() + '-' + String(d.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0'); const label = d.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long' }); options.push({ value, label }); } options.reverse().forEach(option => { const optionElement = document.createElement('option'); optionElement.value = option.value; optionElement.textContent = option.label; select.appendChild(optionElement); }); } }); } async function loadDashboard() { try { const facilityFilter = document.getElementById('dashboardFacilityFilter')?.value || ''; const monthFilter = document.getElementById('dashboardMonthFilter')?.value || ''; let queryParams = ''; if (facilityFilter || monthFilter) { const params = new URLSearchParams(); if (facilityFilter) params.append('facilityId', facilityFilter); if (monthFilter) params.append('month', monthFilter); queryParams = '?' + params.toString(); } const [patientsData, facilitiesData, suppliesData, usersData] = await Promise.all([ apiCall('/patients' + queryParams), apiCall('/facilities'), apiCall('/supplies'), currentUser.role === 'admin' ? apiCall('/users') : Promise.resolve([]) ]); document.getElementById('totalPatients').textContent = formatNumber(patientsData.length); document.getElementById('totalFacilities').textContent = formatNumber(facilitiesData.length); document.getElementById('totalSupplies').textContent = formatNumber(suppliesData.length); document.getElementById('totalUsers').textContent = formatNumber(usersData.length); if (currentUser.role === 'admin') { try { const dashboardSummary = await apiCall('/dashboard/summary' + queryParams); const totalCost = dashboardSummary.reduce((sum, item) => sum + parseFloat(item.total_cost || 0), 0); document.getElementById('totalSupplyCost').textContent = formatCurrency(totalCost); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load dashboard summary:', error); } } patients = patientsData; } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load dashboard:', error); } } async function loadPatients() { try { const facilityFilter = document.getElementById('patientFacilityFilter')?.value || ''; const monthFilter = document.getElementById('patientMonthFilter')?.value || ''; let queryParams = ''; if (facilityFilter || monthFilter) { const params = new URLSearchParams(); if (facilityFilter) params.append('facilityId', facilityFilter); if (monthFilter) params.append('month', monthFilter); queryParams = '?' + params.toString(); } patients = await apiCall('/patients' + queryParams); displayPatients(); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load patients:', error); document.getElementById('patientsContent').innerHTML = '
Failed to load patients
'; } } function searchPatients() { const searchTerm = document.getElementById('patientSearch').value.toLowerCase(); displayPatients(searchTerm); } function displayPatients(searchTerm = '') { const content = document.getElementById('patientsContent'); let filteredPatients = patients; if (searchTerm) { filteredPatients = patients.filter(patient => patient.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ); } if (filteredPatients.length === 0) { content.innerHTML = '
No patients found
'; return; } const tableRows = []; filteredPatients.forEach(patient => { const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = '		' + (patient.name || '') + '' + (patient.mrn || 'N/A') + '' + formatMonth(patient.month) + '' + (patient.facility_name || 'N/A') + '' + new Date(patient.created_at).toLocaleDateString() + '
' + '' + '' + '
' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + tableRows.join('') + '' + '
NameMRNMonthFacilityCreatedActions
'; content.innerHTML = ''; content.appendChild(table); } let editingPatient = null; function openAddPatientModal() { editingPatient = null; document.getElementById('patientModalTitle').textContent = 'Add New Patient'; document.getElementById('patientName').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientMrn').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientMonth').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientFacility').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('savePatientBtn').textContent = 'Save Patient'; document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display = 'block'; } function editPatient(patientId) { const patient = patients.find(p => p.id === patientId); if (!patient) return; editingPatient = patient; document.getElementById('patientModalTitle').textContent = 'Edit Patient'; document.getElementById('patientName').value = patient.name || ''; document.getElementById('patientMrn').value = patient.mrn || ''; document.getElementById('patientMonth').value = patient.month || ''; document.getElementById('patientFacility').value = patient.facility_id || ''; document.getElementById('patientModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('savePatientBtn').textContent = 'Update Patient'; document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closePatientModal() { document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display = 'none'; editingPatient = null; } async function savePatient() { const name = document.getElementById('patientName').value.trim(); const mrn = document.getElementById('patientMrn').value.trim(); const month = document.getElementById('patientMonth').value; const facilityId = document.getElementById('patientFacility').value; const saveBtn = document.getElementById('savePatientBtn'); if (!name || !month || !facilityId) { showError('patientModalError', 'Please fill in all required fields'); return; } saveBtn.disabled = true; saveBtn.textContent = editingPatient ? 'Updating...' : 'Saving...'; try { const patientData = { name, mrn: mrn || null, month, facilityId: parseInt(facilityId) }; if (editingPatient) { await apiCall('/patients/' + editingPatient.id, { method: 'PUT', body: patientData }); showToast('Patient updated successfully'); } else { await apiCall('/patients', { method: 'POST', body: patientData }); showToast('Patient added successfully'); } closePatientModal(); await loadPatients(); await loadDashboard(); } catch (error) { showError('patientModalError', error.message || 'Failed to save patient'); } finally { saveBtn.disabled = false; saveBtn.textContent = editingPatient ? 'Update Patient' : 'Save Patient'; } } function deletePatient(patientId) { const patient = patients.find(p => p.id === patientId); if (!patient) return; if (confirm('Delete patient "' + patient.name + '"? This action cannot be undone.')) { apiCall('/patients/' + patientId, { method: 'DELETE' }) .then(() => { showToast('Patient deleted successfully'); loadPatients(); loadDashboard(); }) .catch(error => { showToast(error.message || 'Failed to delete patient', 'error'); }); } } function showSection(sectionName) { document.querySelectorAll('.nav-btn').forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active')); if (event && event.target) { event.target.classList.add('active'); } document.querySelectorAll('.section').forEach(section => section.classList.remove('active')); document.getElementById(sectionName + 'Section').classList.add('active'); switch(sectionName) { case 'dashboard': loadDashboard(); break; case 'patients': loadPatients(); break; } } window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async () => { const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken'); if (token) { try { const response = await apiCall('/auth/verify'); currentUser = response.user; showMainApp(); } catch (error) { console.error('Token verification failed:', error); localStorage.removeItem('authToken'); } } }); document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => { if (e.key === 'Enter') { if (document.getElementById('loginForm').style.display !== 'none') { login(); } else if (document.getElementById('registerForm').style.display !== 'none') { register(); } else if (document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display === 'block') { savePatient(); } } if (e.key === 'Escape') { closePatientModal(); } }); window.onclick = function(event) { const patientModal = document.getElementById('patientModal'); if (event.target === patientModal) { closePatientModal(); } } + cost + '' + '' + isCustom + '' + '' + date + '' + '
' + '' + '' + '
'; tbody.appendChild(row); }); tableHTML.appendChild(thead); tableHTML.appendChild(tbody); table.appendChild(tableHTML); content.innerHTML = ''; content.appendChild(table); if (currentUser && currentUser.role === 'admin') { content.querySelectorAll('.admin-only').forEach(el => el.classList.add('show-admin')); } } // Batch Upload Functions function downloadPatientTemplate() { const csvContent = "Name,MRN,MM-YYYY,Facility\nJohn Doe,12345,2024-08,Main Hospital\nJane Smith,67890,2024-08,Clinic North"; const blob = new Blob([csvContent], { type: 'text/csv' }); const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob); const a = document.createElement('a'); a.href = url; a.download = 'patient_template.csv'; a.click(); window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url); } function openBatchUploadModal() { document.getElementById('batchUploadModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeBatchUploadModal() { document.getElementById('batchUploadModal').style.display = 'none'; batchUploadData = null; document.getElementById('batchUploadPreview').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('processBatchBtn').style.display = 'none'; } function handleBatchFile(file) { if (!file) return; const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = function(e) { try { const csv = e.target.result; const lines = csv.split('\n'); const headers = lines[0].split(','); if (!headers.includes('Name') || !headers.includes('MM-YYYY') || !headers.includes('Facility')) { showError('batchUploadError', 'Invalid file format. Please use the provided template.'); return; } batchUploadData = []; for (let i = 1; i < lines.length; i++) { if (lines[i].trim()) { const data = lines[i].split(','); batchUploadData.push({ name: data[0]?.trim(), mrn: data[1]?.trim(), month: data[2]?.trim(), facility: data[3]?.trim() }); } } document.getElementById('batchUploadPreview').innerHTML = '

Preview: ' + batchUploadData.length + ' patients ready to upload

'; document.getElementById('batchUploadPreview').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('processBatchBtn').style.display = 'inline-block'; } catch (error) { showError('batchUploadError', 'Error reading file: ' + error.message); } }; reader.readAsText(file); } async function processBatchUpload() { if (!batchUploadData || batchUploadData.length === 0) return; const btn = document.getElementById('processBatchBtn'); btn.disabled = true; btn.textContent = 'Processing...'; let successCount = 0; let errorCount = 0; for (const patientData of batchUploadData) { try { const facility = facilities.find(f => f.name === patientData.facility); if (!facility) { errorCount++; continue; } await apiCall('/patients', { method: 'POST', body: { name: patientData.name, mrn: patientData.mrn || null, month: patientData.month, facilityId: parseInt(facility.id) } }); successCount++; } catch (error) { errorCount++; } } showToast('Batch upload complete: ' + successCount + ' successful, ' + errorCount + ' failed'); closeBatchUploadModal(); await loadPatients(); await loadDashboard(); } // Facility Management function openAddFacilityModal() { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } editingFacility = null; document.getElementById('facilityModalTitle').textContent = 'Add New Facility'; document.getElementById('facilityName').value = ''; document.getElementById('facilityModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('saveFacilityBtn').textContent = 'Save Facility'; document.getElementById('facilityModal').style.display = 'block'; } function editFacility(facilityId) { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } const facility = facilities.find(f => f.id === facilityId); if (!facility) return; editingFacility = facility; document.getElementById('facilityModalTitle').textContent = 'Edit Facility'; document.getElementById('facilityName').value = facility.name || ''; document.getElementById('facilityModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('saveFacilityBtn').textContent = 'Update Facility'; document.getElementById('facilityModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closeFacilityModal() { document.getElementById('facilityModal').style.display = 'none'; editingFacility = null; } async function saveFacility() { const name = document.getElementById('facilityName').value.trim(); const saveBtn = document.getElementById('saveFacilityBtn'); if (!name) { showError('facilityModalError', 'Please enter a facility name'); return; } saveBtn.disabled = true; saveBtn.textContent = editingFacility ? 'Updating...' : 'Saving...'; try { if (editingFacility) { await apiCall('/facilities/' + editingFacility.id, { method: 'PUT', body: { name } }); showToast('Facility updated successfully'); } else { await apiCall('/facilities', { method: 'POST', body: { name } }); showToast('Facility added successfully'); } closeFacilityModal(); await loadFacilities(); await loadFacilitiesTable(); populateFilters(); populateReportFilters(); } catch (error) { showError('facilityModalError', error.message || 'Failed to save facility'); } finally { saveBtn.disabled = false; saveBtn.textContent = editingFacility ? 'Update Facility' : 'Save Facility'; } } function deleteFacility(facilityId) { if (currentUser?.role !== 'admin') { showToast('Admin access required', 'error'); return; } const facility = facilities.find(f => f.id === facilityId); if (!facility) return; if (confirm('Delete facility "' + facility.name + '"? This action cannot be undone.')) { apiCall('/facilities/' + facilityId, { method: 'DELETE' }) .then(() => { showToast('Facility deleted successfully'); loadFacilities(); loadFacilitiesTable(); populateFilters(); populateReportFilters(); }) .catch(error => { showToast(error.message || 'Failed to delete facility', 'error'); }); } } async function loadFacilitiesTable() { try { facilities = await apiCall('/facilities'); displayFacilities(); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load facilities:', error); document.getElementById('facilitiesContent').innerHTML = '
Failed to load facilities
'; } } function displayFacilities(searchTerm = '') { const content = document.getElementById('facilitiesContent'); let filteredFacilities = facilities; if (searchTerm) { filteredFacilities = facilities.filter(facility => facility.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ); } if (filteredFacilities.length === 0) { content.innerHTML = '
No facilities found
'; return; } const table = document.createElement('div'); table.className = 'table-container'; const tableHTML = document.createElement('table'); const thead = document.createElement('thead'); thead.innerHTML = '' + 'Name' + 'Created' + 'Actions' + ''; const tbody = document.createElement('tbody'); filteredFacilities.forEach(facility => { const row = document.createElement('tr'); const date = new Date(facility.created_at).toLocaleDateString(); row.innerHTML = '' + (facility.name || '') + '' + '' + date + '' + '
' + '' + '' + '
'; tbody.appendChild(row); }); tableHTML.appendChild(thead); tableHTML.appendChild(tbody); table.appendChild(tableHTML); content.innerHTML = ''; content.appendChild(table); if (currentUser && currentUser.role === 'admin') { content.querySelectorAll('.admin-only').forEach(el => el.classList.add('show-admin')); } } function formatNumber(num) { return parseInt(num).toLocaleString(); } function formatCurrency(num) { return '$' + parseInt(num).toLocaleString(); } function formatMonth(monthString) { if (!monthString) return 'N/A'; const date = new Date(monthString + '-01'); return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long' }); } function showError(elementId, message) { const errorElement = document.getElementById(elementId); if (errorElement) { errorElement.textContent = message; errorElement.style.display = 'block'; } } function showToast(message, type = 'success') { const toast = document.getElementById('toast'); if (toast) { toast.textContent = message; toast.className = 'toast' + (type === 'error' ? ' error' : ''); toast.classList.add('show'); setTimeout(() => { toast.classList.remove('show'); }, 4000); } } async function login() { const email = document.getElementById('loginEmail').value.trim(); const password = document.getElementById('loginPassword').value.trim(); const loginBtn = document.getElementById('loginBtn'); if (!email || !password) { showError('loginError', 'Please enter both email and password'); return; } loginBtn.disabled = true; loginBtn.textContent = 'Signing In...'; try { const response = await apiCall('/auth/login', { method: 'POST', body: { email, password } }); localStorage.setItem('authToken', response.token); currentUser = response.user; showMainApp(); } catch (error) { showError('loginError', error.message || 'Login failed'); } finally { loginBtn.disabled = false; loginBtn.textContent = 'Sign In'; } } async function register() { const name = document.getElementById('registerName').value.trim(); const email = document.getElementById('registerEmail').value.trim(); const password = document.getElementById('registerPassword').value.trim(); const facilityId = document.getElementById('registerFacility').value; const registerBtn = document.getElementById('registerBtn'); if (!name || !email || !password || !facilityId) { showError('registerError', 'Please fill in all fields'); return; } registerBtn.disabled = true; registerBtn.textContent = 'Registering...'; try { await apiCall('/auth/register', { method: 'POST', body: { name, email, password, facilityId: parseInt(facilityId) } }); showToast('Registration successful! Please wait for admin approval.'); toggleAuthMode(); } catch (error) { showError('registerError', error.message || 'Registration failed'); } finally { registerBtn.disabled = false; registerBtn.textContent = 'Register'; } } function logout() { localStorage.removeItem('authToken'); currentUser = null; document.getElementById('authContainer').style.display = 'flex'; document.getElementById('mainApp').style.display = 'none'; } function toggleAuthMode() { const loginForm = document.getElementById('loginForm'); const registerForm = document.getElementById('registerForm'); if (loginForm.style.display === 'none') { loginForm.style.display = 'block'; registerForm.style.display = 'none'; } else { loginForm.style.display = 'none'; registerForm.style.display = 'block'; loadFacilitiesForRegistration(); } } async function loadFacilitiesForRegistration() { try { const facilityList = await apiCall('/facilities/public'); const select = document.getElementById('registerFacility'); select.innerHTML = ''; facilityList.forEach(facility => { const option = document.createElement('option'); option.value = facility.id; option.textContent = facility.name; select.appendChild(option); }); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load facilities:', error); } } function showMainApp() { document.getElementById('authContainer').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('mainApp').style.display = 'block'; document.getElementById('userWelcome').textContent = 'Welcome, ' + currentUser.name; if (currentUser.role === 'admin') { document.querySelectorAll('.admin-only').forEach(el => el.classList.add('show-admin'));
