const monthFilter = document.getElementById('dashboardMonthFilter')?.value || ''; let queryParams = ''; if (facilityFilter || monthFilter) { const params = new URLSearchParams(); if (facilityFilter) params.append('facilityId', facilityFilter); if (monthFilter) params.append('month', monthFilter); queryParams = '?' + params.toString(); } const [patientsData, facilitiesData, suppliesData, usersData] = await Promise.all([ apiCall('/patients' + queryParams), apiCall('/facilities'), apiCall('/supplies'), currentUser.role === 'admin' ? apiCall('/users') : Promise.resolve([]) ]); document.getElementById('totalPatients').textContent = formatNumber(patientsData.length); document.getElementById('totalFacilities').textContent = formatNumber(facilitiesData.length); document.getElementById('totalSupplies').textContent = formatNumber(suppliesData.length); document.getElementById('totalUsers').textContent = formatNumber(usersData.length); if (currentUser.role === 'admin') { try { const dashboardSummary = await apiCall('/dashboard/summary' + queryParams); const totalCost = dashboardSummary.reduce((sum, item) => sum + parseFloat(item.total_cost || 0), 0); document.getElementById('totalSupplyCost').textContent = formatCurrency(totalCost); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load dashboard summary:', error); } } patients = patientsData; } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load dashboard:', error); } } async function loadPatients() { try { const facilityFilter = document.getElementById('patientFacilityFilter')?.value || ''; const monthFilter = document.getElementById('patientMonthFilter')?.value || ''; let queryParams = ''; if (facilityFilter || monthFilter) { const params = new URLSearchParams(); if (facilityFilter) params.append('facilityId', facilityFilter); if (monthFilter) params.append('month', monthFilter); queryParams = '?' + params.toString(); } patients = await apiCall('/patients' + queryParams); displayPatients(); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to load patients:', error); document.getElementById('patientsContent').innerHTML = '
Failed to load patients
'; } } function searchPatients() { const searchTerm = document.getElementById('patientSearch').value.toLowerCase(); displayPatients(searchTerm); } function displayPatients(searchTerm = '') { const content = document.getElementById('patientsContent'); let filteredPatients = patients; if (searchTerm) { filteredPatients = patients.filter(patient => patient.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ); } if (filteredPatients.length === 0) { content.innerHTML = '
No patients found
'; return; } const tableRows = []; filteredPatients.forEach(patient => { const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = '' + (patient.name || '') + '' + '' + (patient.mrn || 'N/A') + '' + '' + formatMonth(patient.month) + '' + '' + (patient.facility_name || 'N/A') + '' + '' + new Date(patient.created_at).toLocaleDateString() + '' + '
' + '' + '' + '
'; tableRows.push(row.outerHTML); }); const table = document.createElement('div'); table.className = 'table-container'; table.innerHTML = '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + '' + tableRows.join('') + '' + '
NameMRNMonthFacilityCreatedActions
'; content.innerHTML = ''; content.appendChild(table); } let editingPatient = null; function openAddPatientModal() { editingPatient = null; document.getElementById('patientModalTitle').textContent = 'Add New Patient'; document.getElementById('patientName').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientMrn').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientMonth').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientFacility').value = ''; document.getElementById('patientModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('savePatientBtn').textContent = 'Save Patient'; document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display = 'block'; } function editPatient(patientId) { const patient = patients.find(p => p.id === patientId); if (!patient) return; editingPatient = patient; document.getElementById('patientModalTitle').textContent = 'Edit Patient'; document.getElementById('patientName').value = patient.name || ''; document.getElementById('patientMrn').value = patient.mrn || ''; document.getElementById('patientMonth').value = patient.month || ''; document.getElementById('patientFacility').value = patient.facility_id || ''; document.getElementById('patientModalError').style.display = 'none'; document.getElementById('savePatientBtn').textContent = 'Update Patient'; document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display = 'block'; } function closePatientModal() { document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display = 'none'; editingPatient = null; } async function savePatient() { const name = document.getElementById('patientName').value.trim(); const mrn = document.getElementById('patientMrn').value.trim(); const month = document.getElementById('patientMonth').value; const facilityId = document.getElementById('patientFacility').value; const saveBtn = document.getElementById('savePatientBtn'); if (!name || !month || !facilityId) { showError('patientModalError', 'Please fill in all required fields'); return; } saveBtn.disabled = true; saveBtn.textContent = editingPatient ? 'Updating...' : 'Saving...'; try { const patientData = { name, mrn: mrn || null, month, facilityId: parseInt(facilityId) }; if (editingPatient) { await apiCall('/patients/' + editingPatient.id, { method: 'PUT', body: patientData }); showToast('Patient updated successfully'); } else { await apiCall('/patients', { method: 'POST', body: patientData }); showToast('Patient added successfully'); } closePatientModal(); await loadPatients(); await loadDashboard(); } catch (error) { showError('patientModalError', error.message || 'Failed to save patient'); } finally { saveBtn.disabled = false; saveBtn.textContent = editingPatient ? 'Update Patient' : 'Save Patient'; } } function deletePatient(patientId) { const patient = patients.find(p => p.id === patientId); if (!patient) return; if (confirm('Delete patient "' + patient.name + '"? This action cannot be undone.')) { apiCall('/patients/' + patientId, { method: 'DELETE' }) .then(() => { showToast('Patient deleted successfully'); loadPatients(); loadDashboard(); }) .catch(error => { showToast(error.message || 'Failed to delete patient', 'error'); }); } } function showSection(sectionName) { document.querySelectorAll('.nav-btn').forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active')); if (event && event.target) { event.target.classList.add('active'); } document.querySelectorAll('.section').forEach(section => section.classList.remove('active')); document.getElementById(sectionName + 'Section').classList.add('active'); switch(sectionName) { case 'dashboard': loadDashboard(); break; case 'patients': loadPatients(); break; } } window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async () => { const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken'); if (token) { try { const response = await apiCall('/auth/verify'); currentUser = response.user; showMainApp(); } catch (error) { console.error('Token verification failed:', error); localStorage.removeItem('authToken'); } } }); document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => { if (e.key === 'Enter') { if (document.getElementById('loginForm').style.display !== 'none') { login(); } else if (document.getElementById('registerForm').style.display !== 'none') { register(); } else if (document.getElementById('patientModal').style.display === 'block') { savePatient(); } } if (e.key === 'Escape') { closePatientModal(); } }); window.onclick = function(event) { const patientModal = document.getElementById('patientModal'); if (event.target === patientModal) { closePatientModal(); } }
